location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 3: William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, Officials at Bussora [Basra], to [John Beaumont and George Green, Officials at Bushire]

mods.abstract: This letter has no stated recipient, but it would appear to be addressed to John Beaumont and George Green, East India Company officials at Bushire. The letter requests the delay of the departure of the Bombaymerchant ship until the arrival at Bushire of Captain Francis McKenny, who is carrying dispatches of great consequence from the Court of Directors for the several presidencies in India.
